channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive-India weighs plan to slash Pakistan water supply with new Indus river project
A Ukrainian F-16 crashed while fighting off a Russian attack after an 'emergency situation' on board. The pilot survived.
Researchers unveil unprecedented satellite that will have to be turned off when it floats over the US: 'This was a pity'
Nvidia customers will push into AI until they 'become irrelevant'
Study exposes hidden danger that could wipe out household savings: 'The economic impacts ... could be even worse'
As Trump targets DEI, Republican-led states intensify efforts to stamp it out
House GOP works to get bill to advance Trump's agenda back on track
item.description: House Republicans are working to get their mega-bill encompassing Trump's legislative agenda back on track Friday morning.

item.title: House GOP works to get bill to advance Trump's agenda back on track
item.description: House Republicans are working to get their mega-bill encompassing Trump's legislative agenda back on track Friday morning.

item.title: 2 climbers die on Mount Everest, unclear if bodies will be retrieved
item.description: Two people died while climbing Mount Everest as hundreds of climbers are attempting to scale the world's highest peak, expedition organizers said.

item.title: Trump suspends asylum system, leaving immigrants to face an uncertain future
Trump blasts former FBI director James Comey over controversial Instagram post
item.description: President Donald Trump lashed out against ex- FBI director James Comey over an Instragram post that contained an image some interpreted as a threat.

item.title: Diddy trial live updates: Cassie cross-examination continues
item.description: Cassie Ventura is back on the stand in Sean "Diddy" Combs' trial for what prosecutors hope will be her final day.

item.title: NJ Transit rail engineers on strike after midnight deadline expires
item.description: NJ Transit rail engineers went on strike at 12:01 a.m. Friday, bringing train service to a screeching halt.

item.title: WATCH: Celebrating 70 years of magic at Disneyland
item.description: In honor of Disneyland’s 70th anniversary, “GMA” shines a light on cast members who have played a key role in making magic for visitors.

item.title: Strike by New Jersey Transit train engineers leaves some 350,000 commuters in the lurch
item.description: New Jersey Transit train engineers are on strike in a dispute over wages, leaving an estimated 350,000 commuters in New Jersey and New York City to se...

item.title: Books to help support your mental health this May
item.description: In honor of Mental Health Awareness Month, Amazon Books Editorial Director Sarah Gelman shares titles focused on self-care, emotional wellness and nav...

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial updates: Cassie Ventura takes stand, continues testimony
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs is standing trial on sex trafficking and racketeering charges in a case that has captured widespread attention.

item.title: Most Americans don't earn enough to afford costs of living, study finds
item.description: The bottom 60% of U.S. households don't make enough money to afford a "minimal quality of life," according to a new analysis.
